title: The Apprenticeship of Duddy's Privates: An Erotic Parody of Mordecai Richler's The Apprenticeship of Duddy Kravitz
description: Duddy Kravitz, that plucky young go-getter from Montreal's St. Urbain Street, has everything going for him as he works up at a retreat for the summer. Everything except land . . . and love. Could he find both? Is there a hot piece of prime, studly land out there just waiting for him? A masterpiece of erotic Canadiana from the master of that particularly narrow genre, Margaret McQuimm.
author: Margaret McQuimm
